nodes.text: G0-T0's Droid Army was the amalgamation of droids across the galaxy, centered in Nar Shaddaa and on G0-T0's personal yacht, the Visionary, loyal to him and ready to bring any Jedi or Sith that they find to him as per their programmed orders.

G0-T0 was responsible for every thing wrong with the droids on the Smugglers' Moon, controlling them with a Central Control Computer aboard the yacht. When the Visionary was destroyed, G0-T0's control ended and the droids' behavior was back to normal.
